title: I live in the Porter\'s Neck area of Wilmington and have noticed a few nights recently that our neighborhood smells like wet cardboard or wet paper. I have noticed a similar smell while on the bridge crossing the river on 140. Could the smell be coming from the plants on 421?
text:
Here's a link to a previous post at MyReporter.com that might answer
your question. Make sure to look at the comments below the answer,
too, for more possibilities. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=5792
